author: admin
title: Continue Data Center Conversation in Seattle: DATASITE, JLL, CapitalSource, Loudoun County & More; Continue Data Center Conversation on November 17 in Seattle
text:
CapRate Events, LLC 
SEATTLE, Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- 
DATASITE, JLL, CapitalSource, Loudoun County & More; Continue Data Center Conversation on November 17 in Seattle 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151022/279535LOGO 
The National Data Center Summit Series is expanding with more valuable market intelligence and networking opportunities in 2015. The nation's premier data center conference series will be held on November 17 with The Greater Seattle & Pacific Northwest Data Center Summit in Seattle. The full-day conference will be held at The Harbor Club in Seattle on November 17. 
The Greater Seattle & Pacific Northwest Data Center Summit will bring together the leading data center real estate and technology infrastructure executives from Seattle, Greater Seattle and Pacific Northwest markets. 
Jeffrey Burges , President, DATASITE 
Don Doyle , Lead Principal Engineer, National Facilities, T-Mobile, USA 
Kemal M. Hawa Shareholder, Greenberg Traurig, LLP 
Rashad Kawmy , Vice President - Leveraged Finance, CapitalSource 
Conan Lee, Managing Director, JLL 
Miles Loo, Jr. , Executive Director, Valuation & Advisory, Cushman & Wakefield Western, Inc. 
Greg Pettine , Director Business Development - Data Center Service Provider Segment, Schneider Electric 
John Regan , Vice President, Data Center Division, Carter Validus Advisors 
Buddy Rizer , Director - Department of Economic Development, Loudoun County 
John Sabey, President, Sabey Datacenter Properties 
Josh Snowhorn , Vice President & General Manager of Interconnection, CyrusOne 
View detailed agenda and registration information > http://cre-events.com/DCSeattle2015/ 

"I've attended many data center events. However, the most significant business opportunities grew from my keynote address and exposure at CapRate's National Data Center Summit Series." -- Bo Bond, Managing Director, Jones Lang LaSalle Brokerage, Inc. 
"I participated in the Chicago Data Center Summit as a panelist in 2014, representing our new subsidiary Forsythe Data Centers. The Summit provided a good opportunity to network with fellow data center and hosting providers and hear about the trends in the Chicago and Midwest data center markets." -- Bill Brennan , President & CEO, Forsythe Technology 
"The National Data Center Summit Series delivers high quality content and meaningful networking in major U.S. cities and regions. The conference is a valuable platform to hear from industry leaders and develop new relationships. It is a high-quality event." -- Todd Bateman , North American Agency Practice Leader - Data Center Solutions, CBRE 
** 2015 Greater Seattle & Pacific Northwest Data Center Summit Schedule ** 
November 17; 2015, 7:00am-4:00pm 
Full-Day Conference at The Renaissance Dallas Hotel: 
Panel sessions to focus on state of the market, new development/site selection, investment, financing, connectivity innovations 
. 
View detailed agenda and registration information > http://cre-events.com/DCSeattle2015/
